analysis.description: FreezableToken.toKey (/unique_chucks/31/0xec11958f705ab1185c539f293eaf6718c1702adf.sol#899-920) is declared view but contains assembly code

Crowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/31/0xec11958f705ab1185c539f293eaf6718c1702adf.sol#254-258) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/31/0xec11958f705ab1185c539f293eaf6718c1702adf.sol#256-257)

TemplateCrowdsale.init (/unique_chucks/31/0xec11958f705ab1185c539f293eaf6718c1702adf.sol#1428-1471) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-MainToken(token).mint(addresses[i],amounts[i]) (/unique_chucks/31/0xec11958f705ab1185c539f293eaf6718c1702adf.sol#1468-1471)
	-MainToken(token).mintAndFreeze(addresses[i],amounts[i],freezes[i]) (/unique_chucks/31/0xec11958f705ab1185c539f293eaf6718c1702adf.sol)

TemplateCrowdsale.init has external calls inside a loop:
	- MainToken(token).mint(addresses[i],amounts[i]) (/unique_chucks/31/0xec11958f705ab1185c539f293eaf6718c1702adf.sol#1468-1471)

TemplateCrowdsale.init has external calls inside a loop:
	- MainToken(token).mintAndFreeze(addresses[i],amounts[i],freezes[i]) (/unique_chucks/31/0xec11958f705ab1185c539f293eaf6718c1702adf.sol)

Reentrancy in TemplateCrowdsale.init (/unique_chucks/31/0xec11958f705ab1185c539f293eaf6718c1702adf.sol#1428-1471):
	External calls:
	- MainToken(token).pause() (/unique_chucks/31/0xec11958f705ab1185c539f293eaf6718c1702adf.sol#1436-1437)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- owner (/unique_chucks/31/0xec11958f705ab1185c539f293eaf6718c1702adf.sol)

TimedCrowdsale.constructor (/unique_chucks/31/0xec11958f705ab1185c539f293eaf6718c1702adf.sol#397-406) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_openingTime >= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/31/0xec11958f705ab1185c539f293eaf6718c1702adf.sol#400-401)

TimedCrowdsale.hasClosed (/unique_chucks/31/0xec11958f705ab1185c539f293eaf6718c1702adf.sol#411-423) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > closingTime (/unique_chucks/31/0xec11958f705ab1185c539f293eaf6718c1702adf.sol#417-423)

FreezableToken.releaseOnce (/unique_chucks/31/0xec11958f705ab1185c539f293eaf6718c1702adf.sol#858-877) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(uint64(block.timestamp) > head) (/unique_chucks/31/0xec11958f705ab1185c539f293eaf6718c1702adf.sol#863-864)

FreezableToken.releaseAll (/unique_chucks/31/0xec11958f705ab1185c539f293eaf6718c1702adf.sol#884-899) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- release != 0 && block.timestamp > release (/unique_chucks/31/0xec11958f705ab1185c539f293eaf6718c1702adf.sol#889-897)

FreezableToken.freeze (/unique_chucks/31/0xec11958f705ab1185c539f293eaf6718c1702adf.sol#920-948) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_until > block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/31/0xec11958f705ab1185c539f293eaf6718c1702adf.sol#922-925)
